titleStmt.title: Diatelesma. The second part of the moderne history of the vvorld containing the last summers actions, in Languedock, Italy, Piemont, Montferrat, Lorrain, the Dukedome of Burgundy, the Franch country, and generally in France, Holland, the West-Indies, and marine occurrences; with some passages of Rome, and Turkey, brought downe to Novemb. 1637.
Diatelesma. Part 4.

Diatelesma. The second part of the moderne history of the vvorld containing the last summers actions, in Languedock, Italy, Piemont, Montferrat, Lorrain, the Dukedome of Burgundy, the Franch country, and generally in France, Holland, the West-Indies, and marine occurrences; with some passages of Rome, and Turkey, brought downe to Novemb. 1637.
Diatelesma. Part 4.
titleStmt.author: N. C.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Harper, and are to be sold by Nathanael Butter, and Nicholas Bourne,

notesStmt.note: Part 4 of five news tracts issued from 1636 to 1639, of which the last three are entitled "Diatelesma". "To the reader" of other parts signed: N.C.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
